pages.text: Allowed modifications are under loose guidelines, to be approved they must follow this rule set: $(li)Not provide major advantage over other users (eg. xray)$() $(li)Not intentionally harm the server$() $(li)Not enable harasment of users (auto spammers)$()

pages.title: Example approved mods
pages.text: Maps, eg. Xaeros Mini/World, JourneyMap$(li)Provides slight advantage however allows for greater exploration.$(br2)Zoomify, Ok Zoomer $(li)Basically a hotkey for a Spyglass, not a very big advantage.
